Package ATM.view.events

Class EventCallbackMap

java.lang.Object
ATM.view.events.EventCallbackMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventManager
public class EventCallbackMap extends Object implements EventManager
Managers all callbacks from EventProducers. Realises the EventManager interface to facilitate classes to register callbacks on specific events and tell the callback the UserRequest (if any) and SystemResponse (if any) that should be received. This allows the input output type to be properly cast at either end of the callback.

  • Method Details

    • eventCallback

      public SystemResponse<?> eventCallback​(Event<?> event, UserRequest<?> request) throws EventException
      Primary eventCallback triggered (synchronously) by all EventProducers. Once called, the associated CallbackBlock will be found (if there is one) and the EventHandler function will be called. The UserRequest type and SystemResponse type are check to ensure they match with the types provided when the EventHandler was registered - if they do not, an EventException is thrown. Some EventTypes have default behaviour. If they are called without an Event registered for them, the default behaviour will be used.
      Specified by:
      eventCallback in interface EventManager
      Parameters:
      event - Event triggering the callback
      request - UserRequest.
      Returns:
      SystemResponse
      Throws:
      EventException - is thrown when the SystemResponse/USerRequest type does not match the types provided when the EventHandler was registered.

    • registerCallback

      public void registerCallback​(Event<?> event, EventHandler eventHandler)
      Registered an EventHandler to trigger on a specific event type. Expects the UserRequest type to be null and the SystemResponse type to also be null.
      Specified by:
      registerCallback in interface EventManager
      Parameters:
      event - Event
      eventHandler - EventHandler

    • registerCallback

      public void registerCallback​(Event<?> event, Class<? extends SystemResponse<?>> responseType, EventHandler eventHandler)
      Registered an EventHandler to trigger on a specific event type. Expects only the UserRequest type to be null.
      Specified by:
      registerCallback in interface EventManager
      Parameters:
      event - Event
      responseType - Class that extends SystemResponse
      eventHandler - EventHandler

    • registerCallback

      public void registerCallback​(Event<?> event, Class<? extends SystemResponse<?>> responseType, Class<? extends UserRequest<?>> requestType, EventHandler eventHandler)
      Registered an EventHandler to trigger on a specific event type. The handler should expect a non-null UserRequest from the EventProducer and the EventHandler to return a non-null SystemResponse type.
      Specified by:
      registerCallback in interface EventManager
      Parameters:
      event - Event
      responseType - Class that extends SystemResponse
      requestType - Class that extends UserRequest
      eventHandler - EventHandler
